messages.content:
Can you turn this brief into a descriptive website with headings and content for the intended audience for the ToTs EON Training of Trainers - Comms Brief 
May 2023
Full concept note here: Spark/EON TOT Program (draft)
Title: Thriving Together
Subtitle: Empowering Organizations to Foster Wellbeing and Engagement for Sustainable Impact
About The Program
Thriving Together, part of the Entrepreneurship Opportunities Network (EON), aims to deepen wellbeing and engagement within Innovation Support Organizations (ISOs) in Lebanon, benefiting both the organizations and the communities they serve.
Participants will gain the expertise to facilitate and support continuous growth and development within their organizations by leveraging cutting-edge tools, including AI integrations. The training of trainers’ core focus is cultivating purpose-driven work, self-awareness, effective communication, collaboration, resilience, and personal growth - essential skills for thriving in today's hybrid work environments. 
EON is a program of the From Innovation to Creation project funded by the European Union in collaboration with Bloom and SPARK.
Application Deadline: June 26, 2023
APPLY HERE >> Button that sends to the registration form lower on the page
Eligibility
The organization must support innovative enterprises in Lebanon. Innovation support organizations provide funding, resources, expertise, and networking opportunities to foster innovation and support the growth of innovative ventures; examples include accelerators and incubators, university and training centers, and innovation hubs.
The organization must be providing or looking to provide training, resources, advice, or support to entrepreneurs around innovation, wellbeing, and engagement.
The organization must be operating in Lebanon.
Participating team members should include at least one member of senior leadership.

Benefits for Innovation Support Organizations
Mentorship and Connections: Ability to meet with and receive mentorship from potential strategic partners, potential customers, and your peers.
Advice: Access to a program manager and a mentor who will coach you 1:1 on building and/or improving wellbeing and engagement practices in your organization.
Continued Learning: Access to live and asynchronous sessions tailored to a virtual learning environment to help your organization identify growth opportunities.
Exposure: Exposure through EON’s first conference on Wellbeing and Engagement Strategies for Innovation in early September, including the opportunity to be a keynote speaker and participate in panel discussions.
Program Timeline
Public Launch and Applications Open on Friday, June 2, 2023
Open house events on Wednesday, June 14, and June 21
The application deadline is Monday, June 26
Organizations are notified of selection into the program by Monday, July 4 
The program starts on July 11, 2023, and includes:
Pre-workshop assessments 
A series of 2-hour participatory online workshops reviewing challenges, priorities, and goals, and setting action plans … and direct focused adaptive learning during the workshop.  
Self-guided implementation 
40-minute 1-on-1 coaching session for up to 5 people in each ISO
Post-workshop assessments
Learning Conference is at the end of September
Open House
Join the Open House!
Meet the team and learn more about the program and how it will be empowering organizations to foster wellbeing and engagement for sustainable impact.

1 or 2 events TBD

# Thriving Together: Empowering Organizations to Foster Wellbeing and Engagement for Sustainable Impact

## About The Program
Welcome to Thriving Together, an initiative under the Entrepreneurship Opportunities Network (EON). Our mission is to enhance wellbeing and engagement within Innovation Support Organizations (ISOs) in Lebanon. By doing so, we aim to create a ripple effect of positive change, benefiting both the organizations and the communities they serve.

Through our program, participants will gain the expertise to facilitate and support continuous growth and development within their organizations. We leverage cutting-edge tools, including AI integrations, to provide a comprehensive training experience. Our core focus is on cultivating purpose-driven work, self-awareness, effective communication, collaboration, resilience, and personal growth - essential skills for thriving in today's hybrid work environments.

EON is a program of the From Innovation to Creation project funded by the European Union in collaboration with Bloom and SPARK.

## Eligibility
To be eligible for our program, your organization must:

- Support innovative enterprises in Lebanon. ISOs provide funding, resources, expertise, and networking opportunities to foster innovation and support the growth of innovative ventures. Examples include accelerators and incubators, university and training centers, and innovation hubs.
- Be providing or looking to provide training, resources, advice, or support to entrepreneurs around innovation, wellbeing, and engagement.
- Be operating in Lebanon.
- Include at least one member of senior leadership in the participating team.

## Benefits for Innovation Support Organizations
By participating in our program, your organization will gain:

- **Mentorship and Connections:** Meet with and receive mentorship from potential strategic partners, potential customers, and your peers.
- **Advice:** Access to a program manager and a mentor who will coach you 1:1 on building and/or improving wellbeing and engagement practices in your organization.
- **Continued Learning:** Access to live and asynchronous sessions tailored to a virtual learning environment to help your organization identify growth opportunities.
- **Exposure:** Exposure through EON’s first conference on Wellbeing and Engagement Strategies for Innovation in early September, including the opportunity to be a keynote speaker and participate in panel discussions.

## Program Timeline
- Public Launch and Applications Open: Friday, June 2, 2023
- Open House Events: Wednesday, June 14, and June 21
- Application Deadline: Monday, June 26
- Organizations Notified of Selection: Monday, July 4 
- Program Start: July 11, 2023, including pre-workshop assessments, a series of 2-hour participatory online workshops, self-guided implementation, 40-minute 1-on-1 coaching session for up to 5 people in each ISO, and post-workshop assessments.
- Learning Conference: End of September

## Open House
Join our Open House to meet the team and learn more about the program and how it will be empowering organizations to foster wellbeing and engagement for sustainable impact. Dates for these events are to be determined.

## Apply Now
Ready to join us in fostering wellbeing and engagement for sustainable impact? Click the button below to apply. The application deadline is June 26, 2023.

[APPLY HERE](#)

Instead of saying "participants" we are outreaching directly to Innovation Support Organizations (ISOs) so it should be a landing page for them

# Thriving Together: Empowering Organizations to Foster Wellbeing and Engagement for Sustainable Impact

## About The Program
Welcome to Thriving Together, an initiative under the Entrepreneurship Opportunities Network (EON). Our mission is to enhance wellbeing and engagement within your Innovation Support Organization (ISO) in Lebanon. By doing so, we aim to create a ripple effect of positive change, benefiting both your organization and the communities you serve.

Through our program, your ISO will gain the expertise to facilitate and support continuous growth and development. We leverage cutting-edge tools, including AI integrations, to provide a comprehensive training experience. Our core focus is on cultivating purpose-driven work, self-awareness, effective communication, collaboration, resilience, and personal growth - essential skills for thriving in today's hybrid work environments.

EON is a program of the From Innovation to Creation project funded by the European Union in collaboration with Bloom and SPARK.

## Eligibility
To be eligible for our program, your ISO must:

- Support innovative enterprises in Lebanon. ISOs provide funding, resources, expertise, and networking opportunities to foster innovation and support the growth of innovative ventures. Examples include accelerators and incubators, university and training centers, and innovation hubs.
- Be providing or looking to provide training, resources, advice, or support to entrepreneurs around innovation, wellbeing, and engagement.
- Be operating in Lebanon.
- Include at least one member of senior leadership in the participating team.

## Benefits for Your ISO
By participating in our program, your ISO will gain:

- **Mentorship and Connections:** Meet with and receive mentorship from potential strategic partners, potential customers, and your peers.
- **Advice:** Access to a program manager and a mentor who will coach you 1:1 on building and/or improving wellbeing and engagement practices in your organization.
- **Continued Learning:** Access to live and asynchronous sessions tailored to a virtual learning environment to help your organization identify growth opportunities.
- **Exposure:** Exposure through EON’s first conference on Wellbeing and Engagement Strategies for Innovation in early September, including the opportunity to be a keynote speaker and participate in panel discussions.

## Program Timeline
- Public Launch and Applications Open: Friday, June 2, 2023
- Open House Events: Wednesday, June 14, and June 21
- Application Deadline: Monday, June 26
- ISOs Notified of Selection: Monday, July 4 
- Program Start: July 11, 2023, including pre-workshop assessments, a series of 2-hour participatory online workshops, self-guided implementation, 40-minute 1-on-1 coaching session for up to 5 people in each ISO, and post-workshop assessments.
- Learning Conference: End of September

## Open House
Join our Open House to meet the team and learn more about the program and how it will be empowering your ISO to foster wellbeing and engagement for sustainable impact. Dates for these events are to be determined.

## Apply Now
Ready to join us in fostering wellbeing and engagement for sustainable impact? Click the button below to apply. The application deadline is June 26, 2023.
